name: The Return (sidh589)
description:
This is Siddharth Tiwari Module 2 submission for XAMK OPEN UNIVERSITY IVGC Course.

I made the game from scratch by following the course by Matthew Dickson sir. 

The changes that I made over the default game are:-

  1. Added an item Plaque and action read for it and implemented into the game.
  2. Added InGame music for background.
  3. Added a backdrop for the main game.
  4. Changed font color to Yellow for direction, Orange for items interacted, and White for secret keys required to complete game.
  5. Also added my name somewhere inside the game

Made with Love by Siddharth Tiwari!!
